name: Stackpole Long-Distance Hiking
description: When you're ready for a multi-week trip and are thinking about equipment and logistics, this book will help you meet the challenges. Includes advice about the nutrition of trail foods, dealing with medical issues, avoiding repetitive stress injury and dealing with weather and animals. You’ll learn how to manage a hiking budget, choose trail food and arrange resupply, select gear, and keep the right frame of mind. There’s lots of instructive feedback from ACT and PCT thru-hikers on gear, food, and more.
